simplified: 临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网
traditional: 臨淵羨魚，不如退而結網
pinyin: lin2 yuan1 xian4 yu2 , bu4 ru2 tui4 er2 jie2 wang3

definitions.lin2 yuan1 xian4 yu2 , bu4 ru2 tui4 er2: better to go home and weave a net than to stand by the pond longing for fish (idiom); one should take practical steps to achieve one's aim;
